title: Still Draws Breath (1C25)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, heal that Dwarf.
Lore:	“When thirteen had fallen the rest fled shrieking, leaving the defenders unharmed….”
Rarity:	C
